definition: sb who tries to be on good terms with everyone
overflowing/excessive/indiscriminate
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]

sentences.english: Overly nice guys are too enamored with trying to get everyone involved.
sentences.chinese: 滥好人都太执着于试图让每个人都进来。

sentences.english: The anti-hunting campaigners are just a bunch of bleeding hearts who don't understand the countryside。
sentences.chinese: 那些反狩猎者只不过是一些不懂乡村生活的滥好人。

definition: sb who tries to be on good terms with everyone
one who tries never to offend anybody
Mr Goody-goody/yes-man (sb who agrees with anything)
everything for self and selfish profit (idiom); with no regard for others/selfish/mercenary
fool/imbecile
unable to distinguish right and wrong (idiom)
hypocrite
upright gentleman/man of honor
to bite the hand that feeds one (idiom)
to distinguish right from wrong (idiom)
bad person/villain
to meddle/to be a "nosy Parker"/to be too inquisitive about other people's business
blunderer/bungler
outspoken/artless/tactless
megalomania/egomania/delusions of grandeur
